document_data.caption: A map showing the Palace Stables (labeled #17) south of Fetlock Court.
document_data.name: Palace Stables
document_data.mainbody: The '''Palace Stables''' was a stable located in [[Waterdeep]] during the mid-to-late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Description: The building stood two stories tall.
document_data.Location: The Palace Stables were in the western section of Waterdeep's [[Waterdeep/Castle Ward|Castle Ward]] just north of [[Piergeiron's Palace]] and south of [[Fetlock Court]].{{Cite interactive atlas|Castle Ward}}
